column5: This brand new room is equipped with fast fiber wifi and a queen size bed. Shared bathroom and kitchen with lots of street parking. Very comfortable and spacious.  The house is located 3 minutes from Chinatown, 12 minutes from the Galleria, 21 minutes from Medical Center, and 25 minutes from U of H.  We provide transportation to and from the airport. $50 one way from Hobby Airport and $70 one way from George Bush Airport.
column8: Big Room with Private Livingroom Nearby Fwy 69
